author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Helical Says ‍Mike Slade To Step As Non-Executive Chairman
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Helical Plc:
* ‍MIKE SLADE, NON-EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN, HAS INFORMED BOARD OF HIS INTENTION TO STEP DOWN AT CO‘S ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING IN JULY 2019​
* ‍RICHARD GRANT TO ACT AS FUTURE CHAIRMAN OF COMPANY AND WILL, WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT APPOINTED DEPUTY CHAIRMAN OF HELICAL Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
